S01visvantu:22: (Viśv 1) punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ
S01visvantu:23_0: (Viśv 2) bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyāṃ viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ
S01visvantu:23_1: kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ
S01visvantu:23_2: śālīkṣugomahiṣīsaṃpannaṃ. dhārmiko dharmarājā dharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayati. sa ca rājā
S01visvantu:23_3: śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ
S01visvantu:24: (Viśv 3) so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati. tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā
S01visvantu:25_0: (Viśv 4) sāṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā. dārako jāta abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ
S01visvantu:25_1: prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaś chatrākāraśirā pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs
S01visvantu:26_0: (Viśv 5) tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate. kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya
S01visvantu:26_1: nāmeti jñātaya ūcur yasmād ayaṃ dārako viśvāmitrasya rājñaḥ putras tasmād bhavatu
S01visvantu:26_2: dārakasya viśvantara iti nāmeti. tasya viśvantara iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ.
S01visvantu:27_0: (Viśv 6) viśvantaro dārakaḥ aṣṭābhyo dhātrībhyo 'nupradattaḥ dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ
S01visvantu:27_1: dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanakadhātrībhyāṃ.
S01visvantu:27_2: sa aṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍenānyaiś
S01visvantu:27_3: cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhyate hradastham iva paṅkajaṃ
S01visvantu:28_0: (Viśv 7) sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṃkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ.
S01visvantu:28_1: sa yāni tāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ
S01visvantu:28_2: mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjityādhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni
S01visvantu:28_3: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣy apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe
S01visvantu:28_4: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe cchedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe
S01visvantu:28_5: śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣaṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ
S01visvantu:29_0: (Viśv 8) viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ
S01visvantu:29_1: kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī
S01visvantu:29_2: ca mahati tyāge vartate tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād abhyarthijano
S01visvantu:30_2: kanakarajatamaṇighaṇṭikāpūrṇitaravaiś caturbhis turagair yuktaṃ syandanavaram adhiruhya
S01visvantu:31: (Viśv 10) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāraḥ ity āha ca
S01visvantu:32: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
S01visvantu:33: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
S01visvantu:34: (Viśv 11) ity evam ukte bodhisatvo laghulaghv eva tasmād rathavarād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann uvāca
S01visvantu:35: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
S01visvantu:36: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
S01visvantu:37_2: nāma gajavaram adhiruhya parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiś candra iva nakṣatragaṇaparivṛtaḥ
S01visvantu:38: (Viśv 13) atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprā vedavedāṃgavidas tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantarakumāram abhigamyocuḥ:
S01visvantu:39: jayatu bhavāṃ kṣatriyakumāra ity āha ca
S01visvantu:41: dātum enaṃ{d} gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi //
S01visvantu:42: (Viśv 14) evam ukte bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghulaghv evāvatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
S01visvantu:43: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
S01visvantu:44: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
S01visvantu:45_0: (Viśv 15) śuśrāva ca rājā viśvāmitraḥ putreṇa cātra viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma
S01visvantu:45_1: gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo viprebhyo dattaḥ iti. śrutvā ca puna rājñā visvāmitreṇa
S01visvantu:46: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti.
S01visvantu:48: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktas
S01visvantu:50: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśṛtya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
S01visvantu:52: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācakaṃ //
S01visvantu:53_0: (Viśv 17) athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśaṃ abhigamyaitad vistareṇa
S01visvantu:53_1: nivedayāmāsa. tato mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva priyaviprayogāśaṃkitahṛdayā kṛtakarapuṭā bodhisatvam uvāca:
S01visvantu:54: āryaputra yady evam ahaṃ api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi. na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ. kutaḥ
S01visvantu:55: gaganam iva candravihīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
S01visvantu:56: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā tathā bhaven nārī //
S01visvantu:58_0: avaśyam evāvayor ante viyogena bhavitavyaṃ. eṣa hi lokasvabhāvaḥ. tvaṃ ca pravarānnapānaśayanāsanasaṃvasanopacitā
S01visvantu:59: mūlapuṣpaphalāni cāhāro darbhopalakuśakaṇṭakacitāyāṃ mahyāṃ vicaritavyaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃ copavāsa upavasitavyaḥ,
S01visvantu:61: sarvaprayatnenātithayaḥ pūjayitavyās. tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ. tatra bhavatyā na kathaṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyas tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti.
S01visvantu:62: mādrī kathayaty āryaputra yathāśaktyāham āryaputrasya anuvartiṣyāmīti.
S01visvantu:63: bodhisatvaḥ kathayati yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñeti.
S01visvantu:64: (Viśv 19) tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram abhigamya mūrdhnā praṇipatyovāca
S01visvantu:65: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
S01visvantu:66: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūd // iti
S01visvantu:68: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti. bodhisatva uvāca
S01visvantu:70: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteyaṃ mahīpate //
S01visvantu:72: (Viśv 20) tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaiḥ paurajānapadaśatasahasrair anugamyamāno ratham adhiruhya tasmān nagaravarān nirjagāma.
S01visvantu:73: (Viśv 21) atha kaścit puruṣas taṃ ruditaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvānyatamaṃ puruṣam uvāca:
S01visvantu:74: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanakāyasya rudanaśabda iti. sa uvāca:
S01visvantu:75: kiṃ bhavān na jānīte. yad asmad-
S01visvantu:80: (Viśv 22) tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmān nagaravarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyam abhigamyovāca:
S01visvantu:81_0: nivartantu nivartantu bhavantaḥ. suciram api hi priyasaṃprayogo bhūtvāvaśyam evānte
S01visvantu:82: sarveṣu lokeṣv avagamya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavatīti matvā /
S01visvantu:83: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakaṃpyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ //
S01visvantu:85: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra itas triṃśanmātrair yojanair adhiṣṭhānaṃ yato 'haṃ bhavato guṇaśravaṇād āgata iti. tad arhasi bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti.
S01visvantu:86: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:87: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajaṃ /
S01visvantu:88: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute //
S01visvantu:90: evaṃ na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ. kutaḥ
S01visvantu:91: yady ete na bhaveyur arthanadayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
S01visvantu:92: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
S01visvantu:95: (Viśv 24) atha bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ parameṇa praharṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvovāca
S01visvantu:96: annena mātsaryamalapravāhiṇā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija /
S01visvantu:97: maharṣibhiḥ ṣaḍbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ //
S01visvantu:98_0: (Viśv 25) tato bodhisatvaḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā
S01visvantu:98_1: kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau saṃprasthitau.
S01visvantu:98_2: anupūrveṇa tapovanam anuprāptau. tato viśvantaro bodhisatvas tasmiṃ tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ
S01visvantu:99_0: (Viśv 26) tena khalu samayena anyatamasmiṃ karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati sma.
S01visvantu:99_1: tena sadṛśāt kulāt kalatram ānītaṃ. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati.
S01visvantu:99_2: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jāta aṣṭādaśabhir apalakṣaṇaiḥ samanvāgataḥ.
S01visvantu:100: tasya jujjuko jujjuka iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā.
S01visvantu:101_0: (Viśv 27) anyatamasmiṃ api karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati caturvedajñas. tena sadṛśāt
S01visvantu:101_1: kulāt kalatram ānītaṃ. sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramati paricārayati. tasya krīḍato
S01visvantu:101_2: ramamāṇasya paricārayato duhitā jātā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā caturdināvadhinā
S01visvantu:101_3: mahatī saṃvṛttā. tena brāhmaṇena pratijñā kṛtā:
S01visvantu:102: na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyāpi tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati,
S01visvantu:104: (Viśv 28) atha jujjuko mantrārthī mantragaveṣī tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāntaḥ. sa tena brāhmaṇenābhihito:
S01visvantu:105: bho māṇava kutas tvaṃ kiṃ vā prārthayasi
S01visvantu:106: sa kathayatīcchāmy aham upādhyāyasya pādaśuśruṣāṃ kartuṃ.
S01visvantu:108: śobhanam evaṃ kuruṣva māṇava. karaṇīyam etad brāhmaṇānāṃ.
S01visvantu:109: (Viśv 29) sa tasyāntike vedādhyayanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ. sa medhāvī jātīyaḥ. tena alpīyasā kālena catvāro vedā adhītāḥ
S01visvantu:111_0: mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena
S01visvantu:111_1: vā dātavyā. api tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayeyaṃ dātavyā.
S01visvantu:111_2: anena ca māṇavakena mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigatā. ayaṃ ca aṣṭādaśabhir apalakṣaṇaiḥ
S01visvantu:111_3: samanvāgataḥ. yady etāṃ dārikāṃ sa pratigṛhṇīyāc chobhanaṃ syāt.
S01visvantu:113: māṇava mayā pratijñā kṛtā na mayā kasyacid iyaṃ duhitā rūpeṇa vā kulena vā dhanena vā śilpena vā dātavyā,
S01visvantu:114: api tu yo mamāntikāc caturo vedān adhigamiṣyati tasya mayedaṃ dātavyā. tvayā ca mamāntikāc caturo vedā adhigatāḥ. tavāhaṃ duhitā bhāryārtham anuprayacchāmi.
S01visvantu:117: tasya tena mahatā śrīsamudayena vivāhaḥ kāritaḥ kṛtvā kathayati:
S01visvantu:119: (Viśv 32) sa tāṃ patnīm ādāya svagṛhaṃ gataḥ. sa tayā ucyate:
S01visvantu:120: āryaputra sukumārā nāhaṃ śaknomi karma kartuṃ. mama upasthāyakam anuprayaccheti.
S01visvantu:123: sā kathayaty āryaputra viśvapuryāṃ viśvāmitro nāma rājā. tasya putro viśvantaro nāma. sa yat kiṃcit yācyate tat sarvaṃ dadāti. tasya sakāśān mama upasthāyakaṃ mṛgaya.
S01visvantu:126: (Viśv 33) sa tayā sārdhaṃ viśvapuriṃ gatvā pṛcchati:
S01visvantu:130: (Viśv 34) atha jujjukaḥ patnyā sārdhaṃ tapovanaṃ gataḥ.
S01visvantu:131: (Viśv 35) tato 'sau brāhmaṇo mādryā mūlaphalārtham abhigatāyās tapovanān nirgatya viśvantaram abhigamyovāca:
S01visvantu:135: nūnaṃ tapovanagatau hi phalāmbubhakṣyau bālau sutau nayanatuṣṭikarau manojñau /
S01visvantu:136: duḥkhānvitasya jagataḥ parimokṣaṇārthaṃ viśvantaras tyajati kaṃpati yena bhūmiḥ //
S01visvantu:137: (Viśv 41) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
S01visvantu:138: prasīda tāta māvāṃ parityākṣīs tadānīṃ guruvihīnau gamiṣyāvaḥ
S01visvantu:139: aṃbā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
S01visvantu:140: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān //
S01visvantu:141: tato bodhisatvaḥ sahaviklavahṛdaya .. .. .. .. .. vadanas tau bāladārakau pariṣvajyovāca: putrakau
S01visvantu:142: na me hṛdayaṃ asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇaṃ /
S01visvantu:144: budhy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
S01visvantu:146: (Viśv 42) tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇadīnavilaṃbitākṣaraiḥ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
S01visvantu:147: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
S01visvantu:148: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum aṃba tvam ihārhasi //
S01visvantu:150: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabāvād
S01visvantu:151: yady apriyaṃ kvacana kiṃcid udāhṛtaṃ vā /
S01visvantu:152: śuśrūṣayā ca paripūritam eva na syād
S01visvantu:154: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥpradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanapālakau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramapadād viniścakrāmatuḥ.
S01visvantu:155_0: (Viśv 43) tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo
S01visvantu:155_1: bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapova + + + + niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca punar tayor bāladārakayor
S01visvantu:155_2: ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ prakaṃpito 'nekaiś ca devatāsahasrair
S01visvantu:156: aho pradānasya māhātmyam aho satvasya niścayaḥ /
S01visvantu:157: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ //
S01visvantu:158_0: (Viśv 44) tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāyāśramapadābhimukhī saṃprasthitā.
S01visvantu:158_1: tena ca mahatā bhūmikaṃpena tvaritatvaritam evāśramapadaṃ saṃpratasthe. tatrānyatamā
S01visvantu:158_2: devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyamānāvasthitā mā haiva madrī bodhisattvasya
S01visvantu:160: mṛgarājavadhūvilāsini kim idaṃ mām uparudhya tiṣṭhasi
S01visvantu:161: dhruvam asmi yathā patiṃ gatā laghu mārgād apasarpa me tathā //
S01visvantu:163: tvam api mṛgarājapatnī aham api bhāryā narendrasiṃhasya /
S01visvantu:164: dharmeṇa bhavasi bhaginī mṛgarājñi dadasva me mārgam //
S01visvantu:165: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā
S01visvantu:166: (Viśv 45) tato mādrī 'nimittāny aprasannānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
S01visvantu:168: yathā ca vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vidrāvaṇaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyatīty āha ca
S01visvantu:169: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṃgamaḥ /
S01visvantu:170: kathan nau bālakau tyaktau yathā ca matir utsukā //
S01visvantu:171: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkaṃpo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
S01visvantu:172: suvyaktau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati //
S01visvantu:173: (Viśv 46) saivam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatvā praviśya cāśramapadaṃ sasaṃbhrāntā nirīkṣate,
S01visvantu:174_0: na paśyati tau putrakau. tato mādrī viklavahṛdayā vepamānā sthānapadānusāraṃ vikalpayaty
S01visvantu:174_1: asmin pradeśe jālimāṃ kumāraḥ saha bhaginyā mṛgapotakair abhīkṣṇaṃ krīḍitavāṃ. imāni
S01visvantu:174_2: ca tābhyāṃ pāṃsunagarāṇi kṛtāni. imāni ca tayoḥ krīḍanakāni. tau tu na paśyāmi. atha
S01visvantu:174_3: vā aṃbā na dṛśyata iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ
S01visvantu:175_0: (Viśv 47) ity evam āśaṃkāparigatahṛdayā sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya
S01visvantu:175_1: bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchaty āryaputra kva gatau tau bāladārakāv
S01visvantu:177: tasya tau bālakau dattau tāv anujñātum arhasi //
S01visvantu:178_0: (Viśv 48) athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta. jalāśrayoddhṛteva
S01visvantu:178_1: matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaṃ parivartanaṃ karoti sma. hṛtapoteva kurarī karuṇakaruṇaṃ
S01visvantu:178_2: virauti sma. pranaṣṭavatseva ca gaur bahuvidhaṃ haṃbhāravair vilalāpa. āha ca
S01visvantu:180: duḥkhitāv ananubhūtaduḥkhakau kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
S01visvantu:182: katham adya nu putrakau mama vrajato 'nyasya vaśena duḥkhitau //
S01visvantu:184: na ca me 'dya sudṛṣṭakau kṛtau kṛpaṇair jīvati duḥkhitau bata //
S01visvantu:186: kṣāntimārdavaiḥ sadā gurupriyau duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:187: jñātimātṛparihīnakau ca tau bandhubhiś ca sahasā nirākṛtau /
S01visvantu:188: durjanaṃ janam upetya pāpakaṃ duḥkhitau hi paramaṃ sutau mama //
S01visvantu:189: kṣuttṛṣāparigṛhātmakau sadā kasya tau vaśam upāgamiṣyataḥ /
S01visvantu:190: ārttiduḥkhaparipīḍitau ca tau preṣyabhāvam upayāsyato dhruvam //
S01visvantu:191: karma nūnam iha pāpakaṃ mayā anyajanmani sudāruṇaṃ kṛtaṃ /
S01visvantu:192: prāṇinaḥ priyaśatair viyojitā yena gaur iva viraumy adharmikā //
S01visvantu:193: yena satyavacanena me sadā sarvasatvasamatāṃ nataṃ manas /
S01visvantu:194: tena satyavacanena me sutau dāsabhāvagamanād vimucyatām //
S01visvantu:195: (Viśv 49) tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāḥ pālitakāś ca tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
S01visvantu:197: cetanā iva rudanti vṛkṣakā bālakāḥ stanavihīnakā iveti //
S01visvantu:198: (Viśv 50) punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakāny āśramavāsino mṛgaśāvakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilaṃbitair akṣaraiḥ vacanam uvāca
S01visvantu:199: duḥkham etad aparam hy analpakam yad ramanti mṛgaśāvakā ime /
S01visvantu:201: (Viśv 51) tato mādrī yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny ariktakāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca
S01visvantu:203: kvacid gatau gatāvṛttau hā nṛśaṃsa dvijottama //
S01visvantu:205: tau hi me hariṇapariplutākṣakau komalaiś caraṇakaiḥ kathaṃ gatāv iti //
S01visvantu:206: (Viśv 52) tato bodhisatvas tāṃs tathāparidevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
S01visvantu:207: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
S01visvantu:208: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
S01visvantu:211: tyāgādhiṣṭhānān mādri putrau yadā te tyaktau dustyājau lokanirmokṣaṇārtham /
S01visvantu:212: dadyāṃ svāṃ dārāṃ vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // ity
S01visvantu:213: (Viśv 53) atha mādrī dhairyam ālaṃbya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:214: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
S01visvantu:215: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṃkaḥ prayaccha mām //
S01visvantu:218: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tāraya tribhavāj jagat //
S01visvantu:219_0: (Viśv 54) tataḥ śakro devendras tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ mādryā bodhisatvasya
S01visvantu:219_1: ca vyavasāyam avagamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛta upari vihāyasā tadāśramam upagamyodāreṇāvabhāsena
S01visvantu:219_2: tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:222: tvam eko niḥsaṃgas tyajasi tanayāṃ snehajanakāṃ
S01visvantu:223: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalam arajaṃ prāpsyasi padam //
S01visvantu:224: (Viśv 55) tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
S01visvantu:225: eko 'yam upasthāyakarahitaḥ khedam āpatsyate. yanv aham apy asmāt prāthayeyam iti. tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:228: (Viśv 56) tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:229: nirlajjaś cāsi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhama /
S01visvantu:230: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām //
S01visvantu:231: (Viśv 57) tato bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ. atha mādrī bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:232: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
S01visvantu:233: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi //
S01visvantu:235: aham iha bhuvi mādri nānuśocyaḥ parimṛgayaṃ padam akṣayaṃ viśokam /
S01visvantu:236: tam imam anusara dvijaṃ viśokā mṛgaśaraṇaṃ tv aham āśrame 'bhyupaimi //
S01visvantu:238: idam asmiṃ vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
S01visvantu:240: iti viditvā mādrīṃ ca pāṇinā gṛhītvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
S01visvantu:242: mama bhāryām imāṃ śiṣyāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama //
S01visvantu:245: (Viśv 60) tato mādrī bāṣpoparudhyamānā gadgadakaṇṭhī brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛvirahitā idam abhravīt
S01visvantu:246: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
S01visvantu:247: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
S01visvantu:248: (Viśv 61) tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
S01visvantu:249: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
S01visvantu:250: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
S01visvantu:252: tad brūhi kiṃ varam apīcchasi matsakāśāt //
S01visvantu:256: (Viśv 62) tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramaṃ praviśya bodhisatvasakāśam abhijagmivān. mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhītvā bodhisatvam uvāca
S01visvantu:257: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
S01visvantu:258: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ //
S01visvantu:259_0: (Viśv 63) tataḥ śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigṛhītāraṃ brāhmaṇaṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa
S01visvantu:259_1: yathānyanagaraśaṃkayā tad eva nagaram upagamya tau bāladārakau vikrītum ārabdho yāvad
S01visvantu:260: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
S01visvantu:261: jālinaṃ ceva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte ti dāruṇaḥ //
S01visvantu:262: (Viśv 64) etac chrutvodbhrāntacittaḥ sa rājā prāha kṣipraṃ darśayadhvaṃ kumārau /
S01visvantu:263: nāryaś cakruḥ krośam antaḥpurasthāḥ paurā rājñaḥ kṣipram eyuḥ samīpam //
S01visvantu:271: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam //
S01visvantu:272: (Viśv 66) tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasyamānaḥ svabhavanam upajagāma.
S01visvantu:273: (Viśv 67) śakreṇa ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tad āśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān.
S01visvantu:274: (Viśv 68) tato viśvantaro rājā sarvaṃdado babhūva. sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
S01visvantu:280: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmiṃ loke paratra ceti //
S01visvantu:281_0: (Viśv 69) yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ
S01visvantu:281_1: dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ. tasya suhṛtsambandhibāndhavā mitrāṇi cāgamya kathayanti:
S01visvantu:282: yā kācit tava śrīsaubhāgyasaṃpat sarvāsau viśvantarakumāram āgamyeti. sa kathayati:
S01visvantu:287_0: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāra aham eva sa tena kālena
S01visvantu:287_1: tena samayena. yo 'sau jujjuko brāhmaṇa eṣa evāsau devadattas tena kālena tena samayena.
S01visvantu:287_2: tadāpy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī. etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī. tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ
S01visvantu:287_3: evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ,
S01visvantu:288: prāg eva prabhūtaṃ. ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
